text: phiraun ne un logon se kaha (hae) isase pahale ki ham tumako ijaazat den tum us par eemaan le aae isamen shak nahin ki ye tum sabaka bada (guroo) hai jisane tumako jaadoo sikhaaya hai to main tumhaara ek taraf ke haath aur doosaree taraf ke paanv zaroor kaat daaloonga aur tumhen yaqeenan khurame kee shaakhon par soolee chadha doonga aur us vakt tumako (achchhee tarah) maaloom ho jaega ki ham (donon) phareeqon se azaab mein jyaada badha hua kaun aur kisako qayaam jyaada hai
